Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    The interface UserService provides service methods associated with User entity.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.

                                     long userId,
                                     java.time.LocalDate blockedUntil,
                                     java.lang.String newRole)
                              throws ServiceException
        Processing user with different admin commands.
        Parameters:
        typeCommand - the type command fo processing user
        userId - the user id
        blockedUntil - user lock up date
        newRole - the new role
        Returns:
        true if command done otherwise false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if an exception occurs while processing user
